thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com.au | airportrentals.com.au
thread.title: Geoff

author: Geoff
title: Geoff
text: At our initial decision to make a booking, we hesitated as we were unsure about whether or not the car we were booking would be sufficiently large enough for all of us - the choice we made was very much determined by cost not on passenger capacity (we were in for tight fit with 2 adults and three teenagers). To our pleasant surprise we were offered a larger car that was almost brand new (with a GPS) at no extra cost. The Mahindra Ease was absolutely perfect and the benefit of running on Diesel was a bonus particularly with fuel prices in New Zealand.
